goal.en: This course is mainly divided into three parts: one is to teach the basic knowledge of gold literature; the other is to guide the reading of Shang and Zhou bronze inscriptions; the third is to combine the study of bronze inscriptions and handed down documents to understand the two-week culture and social system. This course hopes to enable students to basically grasp the configuration system and content style of bronze inscriptions, and to understand the political, military, economic, official system, book order and other social systems from the Shang Dynasty to the Zhou Dynasty. At the same time, the methodological training of students will be improved, and the ability and interest in using ancient text materials to study and treat classics handed down from generation to generation will be cultivated.
goal.ch: 本課程主要分為三部分：一是教授金文學的基礎知識；二是導讀商周金文材料；三是結合金文及傳世文獻的研讀，認識兩周文化與社會制度。本課程希望讓同學基本掌握金文的構形系統及內容體例，認識由商至兩周時期的政治、軍事、經濟、官制、冊命等社會制度。同時提昇同學方法學的訓練，培養運用古文字材料研治傳世典籍的能力和興趣。

content.en:
1. Introduction, a brief history of gold literature
2. Bronzeware and bronze inscriptions
3. Basic knowledge of bronze inscriptions
4. Introduction to the Bronze Inscriptions of the Shang and Zhou Dynasties
5. The value and application of bronze inscriptions
content.ch:
1. 緒論、金文學簡史
2. 青銅器與青銅器銘文
3. 金文基礎知識
4. 商周金文導讀
5. 金文的價值與應用

textbook.en: 1.Rong Geng‘A General Study of Yi Ware in Shang and Zhou Dynasties‘ 2.Rong Geng‘Jin Wenbian‘ 3.Ma Chengyuan “Selected Inscriptions on Bronze Wares of Shang and Zhou Dynasties“ 4.“Collection of Yin and Zhou Bronze Inscriptions“ by the Institute of Archeology, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences
textbook.ch: 1. 容庚《商周彝器通考》中華書局，2008年。 2. 容庚《金文編》中華書局，1985年。 3. 馬承源《商周青銅器銘文選》文物出版社，1986年。 4. 中國社會科學院考古所《殷周金文集成》中華書局，2007年。
